name: Random Nightmare's DEMO
description:
Random Nightmare's is a singleplayer FPS campaign that will take you through 5 different and unique levels. While there only is one gun in the game at this time i plan to add more in future development. You will also find 2 melee weapons, one is given to you and one is in a hidden spot. Enemies will vary depending on what level you are on. There are 5 different types of enemies that vary in attack style. Hope you enjoy the game and get scared!
